vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Καῖσαρ, -αρος, ὁ
Cæsar: Mat.22:17, Luk.2:1, Jhn.19:12, Act.25:8 ff., al
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)

vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Luk.2.1; also called Augustan (KJV: Augustus; NIV: Imperial) at Act.27.1;  "emperor" at Act.25.21,25;  Caesar at Luk.2.1; 3.1;
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
該撒 这个陽性名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "切斷的"
本是凱撒大帝的名字,後來成為羅馬皇帝的頭銜
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
该撒 这个阳性名词在拉丁文的意思是 "切断的"
本是凯撒大帝的名字,后来成为罗马皇帝的头衔
